original: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug pa'i tshe gtong bas spong ba zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩkhams @122a * //üîΩgang du dang po nyid du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug pa'i tshe gtong bas spong ba zhes bya ba yin no // khams @122a * // gang du dang po nyid du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: dhƒÅtu of nirvƒÅ·πáa without remainder.üîΩIn which realm is the first obtained?

original: rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba kho na dang por rnyed pa dris pa la dgos pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba kho na dang por rnyed pa dris pa la dgos pa ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the purpose of asking about the first acquisition of karmic maturation?

original: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems kyis nying mtshams sbyor ba gsal bar bya ba'o //üîΩ'dod par dang por rnam smin gnyis //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems kyis nying mtshams sbyor ba gsal bar bya ba'o // 'dod par dang por rnam smin gnyis //
translated: It is to clarify that rebirth is not due to an afflicted mind.

original: zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ;
translated: Two karmic maturations in the desire realm.

original: dang por zhes bya ba ci'i don du yin zhe na /
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba ci'i don du yin zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of the first?

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po rnam par smin pas bsdus pa rnams phyis rim gyis rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po rnam par smin pas bsdus pa rnams phyis rim gyis rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the eye, ear, nose, and tongue faculties that are included in the stage of an arhat are obtained later on in a gradual manner.

original: rdzus te skye bas min zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdzus te skye bas min zhes bya ba la /
translated: They are not obtained by those who are born supernaturally.

original: rdzus te skye ba rnams ni dbang po tshang bar skye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rdzus te skye ba rnams ni dbang po tshang bar skye ba'i phyir /
translated: Because those who are born supernaturally are born with complete faculties.

original: ci'i phyir yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why are the mental faculty and the faculty of equanimity not mentioned?

original: rnam par smin pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not considered to be karmic maturation.

original: skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can //
analyzed: skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can //
translated: The birth existence is afflicted.

original: zhes bya bas de dag de'i tshe gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la /
analyzed: zhes bya bas de dag de'i tshe gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, at that time, they are definitely afflicted.

original: rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no //
translated: But karmic maturation is indeterminate.

original: dad pa la sogs pa rnams kyang de'i tshe rnyed mod kyi ;üîΩde dag dge ba yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa rnams kyang de'i tshe rnyed mod kyi ; de dag dge ba yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Faith and so on are obtained at that time,üîΩbut they are not karmic maturation

original: rnam par smin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: because they are virtuous.

original: nur nur po la sogs pa'i gzugs dbang po ma yin pa'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams kyang de'i tshe rnyed mod kyi /üîΩde dag 'dir ni ma smos te /
analyzed: nur nur po la sogs pa'i gzugs dbang po ma yin pa'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams kyang de'i tshe rnyed mod kyi / de dag 'dir ni ma smos te /
translated: The form of the embryo, such as the kalala, which arises from the karmic maturation of the sense faculties, is also obtained at that time.

original: dbang po'i skabs su bab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i skabs su bab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is not mentioned here because it is not the topic.

original: yang rdzus te skye ba dag gis du zhig 'thob ce na ste /
analyzed: yang rdzus te skye ba dag gis du zhig 'thob ce na ste /
translated: How many faculties are obtained by those who are born supernaturally?

original: 'dod pa dag tu dang por zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa dag tu dang por zhes sbyar ro //
translated: They should be supplied with ‚Äúin the desire realm.‚Äù

original: gal te mtshan med pa zhig yin na ste zhes bya ba ni pho dang mo'i dbang po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te mtshan med pa zhig yin na ste zhes bya ba ni pho dang mo'i dbang po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If they are sexless,üîΩthey obtain five faculties.

original: pho nyid dang mo nyid du mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir pho'i dbang po dang mo'i dbang po la mtshan zhes brjod do //
analyzed: pho nyid dang mo nyid du mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir pho'i dbang po dang mo'i dbang po la mtshan zhes brjod do //
translated: The male and female faculties are called sex because they manifest as a male or female.üîΩThose born supernaturally who are sexless do not have these in the present.

original: rdzus te skye ba mtshan med pa rnams da lta med pas 'dir bskal pa dang po pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rdzus te skye ba mtshan med pa rnams da lta med pas 'dir bskal pa dang po pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, the example is given: ‚ÄúThose in the first eon of the world.‚Äù

original: mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If they have one sex,

original: pho dang mo'i dbang po gang yang rung ba zhig med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pho dang mo'i dbang po gang yang rung ba zhig med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they lack either the male or female faculty.

original: mi rnams kyi nang na da lta rdzus te skye ba med pas 'di ltar lha la sogs pa dag na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi nang na da lta rdzus te skye ba med pas 'di ltar lha la sogs pa dag na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Since no one is born supernaturally among humans, he says, ‚Äúin the desire realm, such as among the gods.‚Äù

original: 'di ni skye gnas khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes bya bar mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ni skye gnas khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes bya bar mthong ste /
translated: This is the superior mode of birth.

original: 'dri ba ni /
analyzed: 'dri ba ni /
translated: The question is asked:

original: ci rdzus te skye ba yang mtshan gnyis pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ci rdzus te skye ba yang mtshan gnyis pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúCan one who is born supernaturally be bisexual?‚Äù

original: 'dod pa'i sgra ni yul dag gam yul gyi 'dod chags rnams la 'jug gi / khams la ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i sgra ni yul dag gam yul gyi 'dod chags rnams la 'jug gi / khams la ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The term desire realm refers to objects or to the attachments to objects, but not to the realm.

original: de'i phyir / 'dod pa'i gtso bo @122b yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'dod pa'i gtso bo @122b yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúBecause it is the principal desire realm,‚Äù

original: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams yin la /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams yin la /
translated: Desire refers to objects such as form.

original: de gtso bor gyur pa ni 'dod pa'i khams yin te /
analyzed: de gtso bor gyur pa ni 'dod pa'i khams yin te /
translated: The desire realm is the principal desire realm.

original: de'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams zhes bstan to //
translated: Therefore, it is taught as the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams gnyis ka gzugs yod pa nyid du mtshungs bzhin du gzugs kyi khams kho na gzugs zhes bya ba'i sgras ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams gnyis ka gzugs yod pa nyid du mtshungs bzhin du gzugs kyi khams kho na gzugs zhes bya ba'i sgras ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
translated: Why is it that the form realm alone is called form, even though both the desire realm and the form realm are similar in that form exists there?

original: de'i gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de'i gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: Because form there is primary.

original: gzugs de ni dang ba yin pa'i phyir dang / 'od can yin pa'i phyir gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: gzugs de ni dang ba yin pa'i phyir dang / 'od can yin pa'i phyir gtso bo yin no //
translated: That form is primary because it is clear and luminous.

original: mdo las kyang zhes bya ba 'dis ni mdo las gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sgras gzugs kyi khams gsungs so zhes ston to //
analyzed: mdo las kyang zhes bya ba 'dis ni mdo las gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sgras gzugs kyi khams gsungs so zhes ston to //
translated: The s≈´tras also say that the form realm is called form because it is primary.

original: gong mar gcig ces bya ba la //
analyzed: gong mar gcig ces bya ba la //
translated: One is above.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams ni gzugs kyi khams pas gong ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams ni gzugs kyi khams pas gong ma yin no //
translated: The formless realm is above the form realm.

original: yul na mi gnas pas gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs kyi khams pas gong mar ci ltar brjod ce na /
analyzed: yul na mi gnas pas gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs kyi khams pas gong mar ci ltar brjod ce na /
translated: How can the formless realm be said to be above the form realm when it does not exist in a place above the form realm?

original: de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pas ring ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pas ring ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, because it is distant through meditative equipoise.

original: gang gi phyir gzugs su snyoms par 'jug pa ni snga ma la gzugs med par snyoms par 'jug pa ni 'phyi ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzugs su snyoms par 'jug pa ni snga ma la gzugs med par snyoms par 'jug pa ni 'phyi ba yin no //
translated: because the meditative attainment of the formless realm is subsequent to the meditative attainment of the form realm.

original: de lta snga phyi nyid kyis yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta snga phyi nyid kyis yin gyi /
translated: It is subsequent in this way,

original: 'dod pa'i dang gzugs kyi khams ltar yul na gnas pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dang gzugs kyi khams ltar yul na gnas pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: but not subsequent in terms of place, as is the case with the desire realm and form realm.

original: gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i khams ni gzugs kyi khams pas skye bas ches mchog yin pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i khams ni gzugs kyi khams pas skye bas ches mchog yin pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: And because the formless realm is superior to the form realm in terms of birth.

original: der ni bskal pa stong phrag mang por ches rab tu zhi ba rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: der ni bskal pa stong phrag mang por ches rab tu zhi ba rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
translated: For, in the formless realm, the karmic maturation of extremely tranquil states lasts for many thousands of eons.

original: de'i phyir yang gong ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang gong ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is also superior in terms of duration.

original: srog gi dbang po gcig bu kho na dang por rnam par smin pa zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro ;
analyzed: srog gi dbang po gcig bu kho na dang por rnam par smin pa zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro ;
translated: The context is that only the faculty of life force is the karmic maturation of karma.

original: / de na gzugs med pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa rnams ma yin la /
analyzed: / de na gzugs med pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa rnams ma yin la /
translated: Because there is no form in the formless realm, the eye faculty and so on are not karmic maturation.

original: dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir gzhan rnams kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir gzhan rnams kyang ma yin no //
translated: And because they are virtuous or afflicted, the other faculties are also not karmic maturation.

original: slob dpon 'dus bzang na re ni srog gi dbang po rdzas su yod pa nyid kyi shes par byed pa nyid 'di kho na yin te /
analyzed: slob dpon 'dus bzang na re ni srog gi dbang po rdzas su yod pa nyid kyi shes par byed pa nyid 'di kho na yin te /
translated: Master Sanghabhadra says: This alone is the proof that the faculty of life force exists as a substance.

original: de med na gang rnyed pas gzugs med pa dag tu skyes pa zhes bya /
analyzed: de med na gang rnyed pas gzugs med pa dag tu skyes pa zhes bya /
translated: If it did not exist, then when one obtains the formless realm, one would not be said to be born in the formless realm.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis skye bar nying mtshams sbyor bas khas blangs pa'i phyir na rnam par smin pa'i sems kyis mtshams sbyor bar yang mi rigs la /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis skye bar nying mtshams sbyor bas khas blangs pa'i phyir na rnam par smin pa'i sems kyis mtshams sbyor bar yang mi rigs la /
translated: Since it is accepted that one is conceived in the womb through afflicted mind, it is illogical that one is conceived through the maturational mind.

original: rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pa med par skye ba yang mi rigs pa de'i phyir /üîΩgdon mi za bar skye ba'i rtags su gyur pa chos gzhan @123a * //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pa med par skye ba yang mi rigs pa de'i phyir / gdon mi za bar skye ba'i rtags su gyur pa chos gzhan @123a * //
translated: And it is illogical that one is born without being related to karmic maturation.

original: zhig khas blang bar bya dgos so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zhig khas blang bar bya dgos so zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, it is necessary to accept that there is another phenomenon that is the sign of birth.

original: gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni //
analyzed: gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni //
translated: Death in the formless realmüîΩis through degeneration of mind and life force.

original: zhes bya bar rgyas par 'byung ba ni srog dang / yid dang / btang snyoms rnams phan tshun mi gtong ba'i phyir te /üîΩbtang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni //
analyzed: zhes bya bar rgyas par 'byung ba ni srog dang / yid dang / btang snyoms rnams phan tshun mi gtong ba'i phyir te /üîΩbtang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni //
translated: The formless realm is called formless because it is devoid of form.

original: yid dang ldan la nges gsum ldan //
analyzed: yid dang ldan la nges gsum ldan //
translated: The mind and mental factors of the realm of immateriality are associated with three sensations.

original: zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la dad pa la sogs pa med pas gzugs med pa'i khams su 'chi ba na gdon mi za bar gsum po de dag 'gag go //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la dad pa la sogs pa med pas gzugs med pa'i khams su 'chi ba na gdon mi za bar gsum po de dag 'gag go //
translated: When dying with a defiled or nondefined mind, there is no faith, etc. Thus, when dying in the realm of immateriality, these three sensations necessarily cease.

original: nyid kyang zhes bya ba'i tshig phrad dag gi gnyis ka don yang gcig ste /
analyzed: nyid kyang zhes bya ba'i tshig phrad dag gi gnyis ka don yang gcig ste /
translated: The words ‚Äúalso‚Äù and ‚Äúeven‚Äù have the same meaning.

original: snga mas ni tshor ba nges par 'dzin to //
analyzed: snga mas ni tshor ba nges par 'dzin to //
translated: The first indicates that sensation is determined.

original: 'og mas ni gzugs can 'gag pa 'gog ste /
analyzed: 'og mas ni gzugs can 'gag pa 'gog ste /
translated: The second indicates that the cessation of the material is stopped.

original: kha cig na re de na gzugs yod do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re de na gzugs yod do zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that there is material form in the realm of immateriality.

original: gzugs na brgyad de dag go //
analyzed: gzugs na brgyad de dag go //
translated: In the realm of fine-materiality, there are eight sensations.

original: de nyid la rgyu smras pa ni /üîΩrdzus te skye ba thams cad ni //
analyzed: de nyid la rgyu smras pa ni / rdzus te skye ba thams cad ni //
translated: The author explains the reason:üîΩAll apparitional sentient beings

original: zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ste /
translated: are born and die with a contented sensation.

original: rdzus te skye ba rnams la mer mer po la sogs pa rnams med pa'i phyir dang / rim gyis 'chi ba med pa'i phyir dbang po tshang ba rnams skye zhing 'chi ba yin no //üîΩ'dod par bcu'am dgu'am brgyad //üîΩces bya ba la /
analyzed: rdzus te skye ba rnams la mer mer po la sogs pa rnams med pa'i phyir dang / rim gyis 'chi ba med pa'i phyir dbang po tshang ba rnams skye zhing 'chi ba yin no // 'dod par bcu'am dgu'am brgyad // ces bya ba la /
translated: Those who are born supernaturally do not have the stages of embryonic growth, and they do not die gradually.

original: mtshan gnyis pa dbang po tshang ba zhig yin na ni bcu 'gag go //
analyzed: mtshan gnyis pa dbang po tshang ba zhig yin na ni bcu 'gag go //
translated: In the desire realm, ten faculties cease for one who possesses two sexual organs.

original: mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ni zhes bya ba ni pho dang mo'i dbang po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ni zhes bya ba ni pho dang mo'i dbang po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig dang ldan pa'o //
translated: For one who possesses one sexual organ, nine cease.

original: mtshan med pa ni de gnyis ka dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan med pa ni de gnyis ka dang bral ba'o //
translated: For one who does not possess a sexual organ, eight cease.

original: cig car 'chi ba la ni 'dod par bcu 'am /üîΩdgu 'am / brgyad ces bya ba tshul de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: cig car 'chi ba la ni 'dod par bcu 'am / dgu 'am / brgyad ces bya ba tshul de lta bu yin no //
translated: If one who possesses two sexual organs dies suddenly, ten faculties cease: the five faculties of the eyes, etc.,üîΩthe mental faculty, the vitality faculty, and the faculties of pleasure, pain, or equanimity.üîΩIf one who possesses one sexual organ dies suddenly, nine cease.

original: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la zhes bya ba 'di gang las she na /
analyzed: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la zhes bya ba 'di gang las she na /
translated: If one who does not possess a sexual organ dies suddenly, eight cease.üîΩIf one dies gradually, four cease.

original: rim gyis 'chi ba dag las bzhi zhes mjug thogs su 'chad pa las so //
analyzed: rim gyis 'chi ba dag las bzhi zhes mjug thogs su 'chad pa las so //
translated: The faculties of pleasure, pain, and equanimity cease in order.

original: mig la sogs pa rnams sngar 'gags zin pa'i phyir dang / lus dang / srog dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / btang snyoms rnams phan tshun mi 'dor bas so sor 'gag pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rim gyis 'chi ba dag las bzhi 'gag go //üîΩtshul de lta bu yin par zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams sngar 'gags zin pa'i phyir dang / lus dang / srog dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / btang snyoms rnams phan tshun mi 'dor bas so sor 'gag pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rim gyis 'chi ba dag las bzhi 'gag go // tshul de lta bu yin par zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.

original: 'chi ba'i srid pa'i sems ni gsum ste /üîΩnyon mongs pa can dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i srid pa'i sems ni gsum ste / nyon mongs pa can dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / dge ba'o //
translated: The faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.üîΩThe faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.

original: de la nyon mongs pa can dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni ji skad bshad pa'i dbang po 'gag par rig par bya ste /üîΩdbang po gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdge la @123b thams cad dag tu lnga //
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa can dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni ji skad bshad pa'i dbang po 'gag par rig par bya ste / dbang po gzhan med pa'i phyir ro // dge la @123b thams cad dag tu lnga //
translated: The faculties that cease in the reverse order are the body, life force, mind, and the faculty of equanimity.

original: zhes bya ba la /üîΩthams cad dag tu zhes bya ba la ni khams gsum char gyi 'chi ba las yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /üîΩthams cad dag tu zhes bya ba la ni khams gsum char gyi 'chi ba las yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The faculties that cease

original: dge ba las ni gdon mi za bar dad pa la sogs pa lnga po 'gag ste /
analyzed: dge ba las ni gdon mi za bar dad pa la sogs pa lnga po 'gag ste /
translated: It is certain that the five such as faith are stopped in relation to virtue.

original: dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni dge ba'i sems la nges par yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni dge ba'i sems la nges par yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the five such as faith definitely exist in virtuous minds.

original: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ji skad bshad pa'ang 'gag go zhes shes par byed do //üîΩrgyas par brtsi bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams na cig car 'chi ba la bco lnga'am /üîΩbcu bzhi 'am /
analyzed: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ji skad bshad pa'ang 'gag go zhes shes par byed do // rgyas par brtsi bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams na cig car 'chi ba la bco lnga'am / bcu bzhi 'am /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that those previously mentioned are also stopped.

original: bcu gsum yin la /
analyzed: bcu gsum yin la /
translated: One should calculate in detail: when dying in the desire realm, fifteen, fourteen, or thirteen faculties cease simultaneously.

original: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la dgu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la dgu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When dying in the form realm, nine cease.

original: dbang po'i skabs su zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: dbang po'i skabs su zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: When dying in the formless realm, eight cease.

original: dbang po'i phung por dbang po'i chos gnas skabs kyi khyad par dang / byed pa'i khyad par thams cad dpyad de /
analyzed: dbang po'i phung por dbang po'i chos gnas skabs kyi khyad par dang / byed pa'i khyad par thams cad dpyad de /
translated: In the section on faculties, all the qualities of faculties, their specific states, and their specific functions are analyzed.

original: des na 'dir yang dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: des na 'dir yang dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Here, one should also analyze them,

original: bstan bcos 'di ni de'i mdzod yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos 'di ni de'i mdzod yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: because this treatise is a treasury of that.

original: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The result of the ascetic is the result of the ascetic.

original: dbang po ma yin pa dag gis kyang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rnams 'thob mod kyi /
analyzed: dbang po ma yin pa dag gis kyang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rnams 'thob mod kyi /
translated: Although the results of the ascetic are obtained by those who are not ascetics,

original: dbang po rnams kyi skabs su bab pa de'i phyir de rnams kho na dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi skabs su bab pa de'i phyir de rnams kho na dpyad par bya'o //
translated: since the topic under discussion is the faculties, we will consider only those results that are obtained by ascetics.

original: 'bras bu tha ma nyid dgus 'thob //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma nyid dgus 'thob //
translated: The last result is obtained by nine.

original: ces bya ba la dgu kho nas nges par gzung ngo //
analyzed: ces bya ba la dgu kho nas nges par gzung ngo //
translated: The last result is obtained by nine faculties.

original: bstan bcos las ni gang zag 'bras bu thams cad du thob pa'i dbang du mdzad nas 'don to //
analyzed: bstan bcos las ni gang zag 'bras bu thams cad du thob pa'i dbang du mdzad nas 'don to //
translated: The treatise mentions the last result from the perspective of the person who obtains all the results.

original: mtha' na yod pa'i phyir tha ma'o //üîΩrgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dag ni mtha' ma ste /
analyzed: mtha' na yod pa'i phyir tha ma'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dag ni mtha' ma ste /
translated: It is the last because it is at the end.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' bzhin du dang po yang mtha' ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' bzhin du dang po yang mtha' ma yin no //
translated: The results of stream-enterer and arhat are the last because they are at the beginning and end, like the beginning and end of a path.

original: de gnyis kyi dbus na ma yin pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dag ni bar ma'o //
analyzed: de gnyis kyi dbus na ma yin pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dag ni bar ma'o //
translated: The results of once-returner and nonreturner are intermediate because they are not in the middle of those two.

original: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The result of stream entry is the result of the paths of seeing and meditation.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang zhes bya bar smos so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang zhes bya bar smos so //
translated: Therefore, the result of stream entry is the five faculties of faith and so on, excluding the faculty of one who has fully understood and the faculty of final and perfect

original: de la dge ba yin pa'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: de la dge ba yin pa'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa rnams yod do //
translated: Since it is virtuous, it possesses the five faculties of faith and so on.

original: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa mthong ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir de na kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po yod do //
analyzed: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa mthong ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir de na kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po yod do //
translated: Since perseverance for subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path is the path of seeing, it possesses the faculty of one who has fully understood.

original: lam la rjes su shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin pas de na kun shes pa'i dbang po yod do //
analyzed: lam la rjes su shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin pas de na kun shes pa'i dbang po yod do //
translated: Since subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path is the path of meditation, it possesses the faculty of perfect knowledge.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i lam ni mi @124a * //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i lam ni mi @124a * //
translated: The path of the result of stream entry is subsumed by unrestricted access concentration.

original: lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa'i phyir dang / de na tshor ba btang snyoms kho na yod pas btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang yod do //
analyzed: lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa'i phyir dang / de na tshor ba btang snyoms kho na yod pas btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang yod do //
translated: Since it possesses the feeling of equanimity alone, it also possesses the faculty of equanimity.

original: de na yod pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi dbang bo'o //
analyzed: de na yod pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi dbang bo'o //
translated: That consciousness which exists there is the mental faculty.

original: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni bar chad med pa'i lam la'o //
analyzed: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni bar chad med pa'i lam la'o //
translated: Acceptance of the subsequent cognition of the path is on the uninterrupted path.

original: rjes su shes pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la'o //
analyzed: rjes su shes pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la'o //
translated: Subsequent cognition is on the path of liberation.

original: gnyis kas kyang zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis kas sam /
analyzed: gnyis kas kyang zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis kas sam /
translated: Both means both the uninterrupted path and the path of liberation.

original: dbang po gnyis kas so //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kas so //
translated: Or both faculties.

original: de 'thob ste zhes bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de 'thob ste zhes bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: One obtains that means one obtains the result of stream entry.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: bral ba'i thob pa'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la ;üîΩbar chad med pa'i lam ni 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bral ba'i thob pa'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la ; bar chad med pa'i lam ni 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The obtainment of separation, etc.

original: bral ba'i thob pa skye ba'i gegs su gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa'i thob pa gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba'i thob pa skye ba'i gegs su gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa'i thob pa gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The uninterrupted path is the leader because it cuts off the obtainment of the affliction that obstructs the arising of the obtainment of separation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bral ba'i thob pa ni bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bral ba'i thob pa ni bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Therefore the obtainment of separation is the natural outflow and the maturational result of the uninterrupted paths.

original: rnam par grol ba'i lam dang lhan cig tu bral ba'i thob pa skye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i lam dang lhan cig tu bral ba'i thob pa skye ba'i phyir /
translated: Obtainment of separation arises simultaneously with the liberated path.

original: rnam par grol ba'i lam ni bral ba'i thob pa'i rten nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i lam ni bral ba'i thob pa'i rten nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore the liberated path is the support of the obtainment of separation.

original: de ltar na bral ba ni rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi 'bras bu ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de ltar na bral ba ni rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi 'bras bu ma yin zhing /
translated: Thus separation is not the result of the liberated path,

original: de'i thob pa yang ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i thob pa yang ma yin na /
translated: nor is its obtainment.

original: ji ltar kun shes pa'i dbang pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar kun shes pa'i dbang pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo zhes brjod ce na /
translated: If that is so, how can it be said that the faculty of complete knowledge obtains the result of stream entry?

original: bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the uninterrupted paths are the retinue of the liberated path.

original: rgyal po'i 'khor gyis byas pa rgyal po la nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin te /
analyzed: rgyal po'i 'khor gyis byas pa rgyal po la nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin te /
translated: The actions of the retinue of a king are imputed to the king.

original: de bzhin du bar chad med pa'i lam gyis byas pa rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams la nye bar 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du bar chad med pa'i lam gyis byas pa rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams la nye bar 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: So too, the liberated paths are designated as the paths of preparation,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dang zhes bya ba la /
translated: The state of an arhat is the faculty of complete knowledge, excluding the faculty of producing complete knowledge and so on.

original: re zhig dad pa la sogs pa dag ni dge ba'i sems las byung ngo //üîΩdgra bcom pa nyid ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir na bar chad med pa'i lam ni kun shes pa'i dbang po ste /
analyzed: re zhig dad pa la sogs pa dag ni dge ba'i sems las byung ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir na bar chad med pa'i lam ni kun shes pa'i dbang po ste /
translated: Faith and so on are the mental factors of virtuous minds.üîΩThe state of an arhat is the result of the path of meditation.

original: de yang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //üîΩrnam par grol ba'i lam ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to // rnam par grol ba'i lam ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste /
translated: The faculty of complete knowledge is the uninterrupted path and that is the vajra like concentration.

original: de yang zad pa shes pa'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: de yang zad pa shes pa'i tshe na'o //
translated: The faculty possessing complete knowledge is the liberated path and that is at the time of the knowledge of elimination.

original: bar chad med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam dag ni bral ba'i thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang / brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar chad med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam dag ni bral ba'i thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang / brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The uninterrupted and liberated paths are the inducer and support of the obtainment of separation.

original: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni ma @124b gtogs te /
analyzed: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni ma @124b gtogs te /
translated: The faculty producing complete knowledge is not included.üîΩ

original: mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyid kyi dbang po dang zhes bya ba la /üîΩyid kyi dbang po ni rdo rje lta bu dang / zad pa shes pa na yod pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // yid kyi dbang po dang zhes bya ba la / yid kyi dbang po ni rdo rje lta bu dang / zad pa shes pa na yod pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The faculty producing complete knowledge is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental pleasure and the faculties of pleasure, mental pleasure, and equanimity are included in the state of an arhat.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.

original: bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams la gang yang rung ba zhig dang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams la gang yang rung ba zhig dang zhes bya ba la /
translated: The faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rten ni dgu ste /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rten ni dgu ste /
translated: The faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / mi lcogs pa med pa dang / khyad par can dang / gzugs med pa gsum dag go //üîΩmdo las dge slong dag bsam gtan dang po la brten nas zad par smra'o zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / mi lcogs pa med pa dang / khyad par can dang / gzugs med pa gsum dag go // mdo las dge slong dag bsam gtan dang po la brten nas zad par smra'o zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.üîΩThe faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched la brten nas zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched la brten nas zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
translated: The faculty of mental dissatisfaction is not included because it is the nature of the path of seeing.

original: de la bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas thob na ni bde ba'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: de la bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas thob na ni bde ba'i dbang po'o //
translated: If the fruit of arhat is obtained in dependence on the third absorption, then the faculty of pleasure is the controlling faculty.

original: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa la brten nas thob na ni yid bde ba'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa la brten nas thob na ni yid bde ba'i dbang po'o //
translated: If the fruit of arhat is obtained in dependence on the first or second absorption, then the faculty of mental pleasure is the controlling faculty.

original: mi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / gzugs med pa gsum la brten nas thob na ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / gzugs med pa gsum la brten nas thob na ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o //
translated: If the fruit of arhat is obtained in dependence on unrestricted access concentration, special absorption, the fourth absorption, or the three formless realms, then the faculty of equanimity is the controlling faculty.

original: de ltar rten gyi bye brag gis bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo //
analyzed: de ltar rten gyi bye brag gis bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo //
translated: Thus, the fruit of arhat is obtained by means of any one of the faculties of pleasure, mental pleasure, or equanimity, due to the distinction of basis.

original: gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus //
analyzed: gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus //
translated: Two are obtained by seven, eight, or nine.

original: zhes bya ba la 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni skabs yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni skabs yin no //
translated: The context is that they are obtained.

original: re zhig gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la /
analyzed: re zhig gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la /
translated: If the fruit of once-returner is obtained in stages,

original: de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob bo //
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob bo //
translated: and if it is obtained by the mundane path, then it is obtained by seven controlling faculties.

original: ji ltar byas nas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar byas nas she na /
translated: How is it obtained?

original: lam mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir na btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kho nas 'thob bo //
analyzed: lam mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir na btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kho nas 'thob bo //
translated: It is obtained by the faculty of equanimity alone, since it is the level of unrestricted access concentration, and by the mind concomitant with that.

original: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: If it is obtained by the transcendent path, then...

original: gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa mthar gyis pa de kho na ste /
analyzed: gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa mthar gyis pa de kho na ste /
translated: The serial abandoner who obtains the result of once return after obtaining the result of stream entry.

original: de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob na ni de'i tshe dbang po brgyad dag gis 'thob ste /
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob na ni de'i tshe dbang po brgyad dag gis 'thob ste /
translated: If he obtains the result of once return by the transcendent path, then he obtains it by eight faculties.

original: snga ma bdun la kun shes pa'i dbang pos bsnan pa brgyad yin no //
analyzed: snga ma bdun la kun shes pa'i dbang pos bsnan pa brgyad yin no //
translated: The seven former faculties plus the faculty of perfect knowledge.

original: gnyis ka yang bsgom pa'i lam yin pa'i phyir na de'i bar chad @125a * //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang bsgom pa'i lam yin pa'i phyir na de'i bar chad @125a * //
translated: Since both are the path of meditation, the faculty of perfect knowledge is added to the seven former faculties.

original: med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam dag la kun shes pa'i dbang po kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam dag la kun shes pa'i dbang po kho na yin gyi /
translated: The faculty of complete knowledge is the faculty of complete knowledge alone on the paths of no-more-learning and liberation.

original: bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis ka tha dad pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dag ji lta ba bzhin ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis ka tha dad pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dag ji lta ba bzhin ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not like the results of stream entry and arhat, because both the uninterrupted and liberated paths are different.

original: de ltar 'dir ni ma yin no //üîΩci ste phal cher las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis zhes bya ba la /üîΩgang zhig 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod par gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam pa drug spangs pa de ni dgus te /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir ni ma yin no // ci ste phal cher las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis zhes bya ba la / gang zhig 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod par gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam pa drug spangs pa de ni dgus te /
translated: But it is not like that here.üîΩIf a person who is free from attachment to the desire realm obtains the result of nonreturn by the mundane path, he obtains it by nine faculties.

original: mthong ba'i lam kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa lta bu ste ;üîΩde dang 'dra ba kho nar dbang po dgus 'thob bo //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa lta bu ste ; de dang 'dra ba kho nar dbang po dgus 'thob bo //
translated: If a person who is free from attachment to the desire realm obtains the result of nonreturn by the mundane path, he obtains it by nine faculties.

original: gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la zhes bya ba la /üîΩrgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas /
analyzed: gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la zhes bya ba la /üîΩrgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas /
translated: If a person who is free from attachment to the desire realm obtains the result of nonreturn by the mundane path, he obtains it by nine faculties.üîΩIf a person who is free from attachment to the desire realm obtains the result of nonreturn by the mundane path, he obtains it by nine faculties.üîΩIf a person who is free from attachment to the desire realm obtains the result of nonreturn by the mundane path, he obtains it by nine faculties.üîΩIf a person who is free from attachment to the desire realm obtains the result of nonreturn by the mundane path, he obtains it by nine faculties.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob la /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob la /
translated: One obtains the result of non-return.

original: de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na /
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na /
translated: If one obtains it by the mundane path,

original: de dbang po bdun gyis 'thob ste /
analyzed: de dbang po bdun gyis 'thob ste /
translated: one obtains it by seven faculties.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: It is just like the result of once-returner.

original: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de brgyad kyis 'thob ste /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de brgyad kyis 'thob ste /
translated: If one obtains it by the supramundane path, one obtains it by eight faculties.

original: ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la kun shes pa'i dbang po brgyad pa yin pa de dang 'dra'o //üîΩci ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la kun shes pa'i dbang po brgyad pa yin pa de dang 'dra'o // ci ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis zhes bya ba la ;
translated: It is just like the eighth, the faculty of understanding all, in the result of once-returner.üîΩIf one who is free from attachment obtains it,

original: de ni 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral zhing /
analyzed: de ni 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral zhing /
translated: one who is free from attachment to the desire realm

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral ba so so'i skye bor gyur pas mthong ba'i lam skyes pa zhig ste /
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral ba so so'i skye bor gyur pas mthong ba'i lam skyes pa zhig ste /
translated: up to the sphere of nothingness, who is an ordinary being, and who has generated the path of seeing,üîΩobtains it by nine faculties.

original: de ni de'i tshe bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar 'dod par gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu pa spangs pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: de ni de'i tshe bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar 'dod par gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu pa spangs pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba kho na yin no //
translated: At that time, he is an anagamin, because he abandons the ninth affliction of the desire realm that is to be abandoned by the path of seeing at the end of the realization of the four truths.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: Just like the result of stream entry.

original: bar chad med pa'i lam la kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam la kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / dad pa la sogs pa rnams dang / yid de de kho na dang 'dra'o ;
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam la kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam la kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / dad pa la sogs pa rnams dang / yid de de kho na dang 'dra'o ;
translated: On the uninterrupted path, he possesses the faculty producing complete knowledge and on the liberated path, he possesses the faculty of complete knowledge. He possesses the five such as faith and the mental faculty, just like the former.

original: /'di ni khyad par yin te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: /'di ni khyad par yin te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: This is the difference.

original: mi lcogs pa med pas thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir na rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dag la ni rtag tu btang snyoms kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pas thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir na rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dag la ni rtag tu btang snyoms kho na yin gyi /
translated: In the results of stream entry and once return, he always possesses equanimity alone, because they are to be obtained by unrestricted access concentration.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ni rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang / yid @125b bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig ste /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ni rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang / yid @125b bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig ste /
translated: The faculty of either pleasure, mental satisfaction or equanimity is added to the result of nonreturn.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas thob pa na ni bde ba'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas thob pa na ni bde ba'i dbang po'o //
translated: If it is obtained in dependence on the third absorption, it is the faculty of pleasure.

original: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa la brten nas bden pa dag kyang mthong na ni yid bde ba'i dbang po'o //üîΩmi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la brten nas 'thob na ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa la brten nas bden pa dag kyang mthong na ni yid bde ba'i dbang po'o // mi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la brten nas 'thob na ni /
translated: If it is obtained in dependence on the first or second absorption, it is the faculty of mental satisfaction.

original: btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o //üîΩgang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o // gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: If it is obtained in dependence on unrestricted access concentration, special absorption or the fourth absorption, it is the faculty of equanimity.

original: dbang po rnon po kho na rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la nye bar bsdogs pa nas bsam gtan la 'jug par nus kyi /
analyzed: dbang po rnon po kho na rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la nye bar bsdogs pa nas bsam gtan la 'jug par nus kyi /
translated: If one is a serial abandoner, then one who is sharp faculty can enter absorption in the ninth liberated path.

original: dbang po rtul po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rtul po ni ma yin no //
translated: But one of dull faculty cannot.

original: tshor ba spo bar dka' ba'i phyir dang / dbang po rnon po yang nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshor ba spo bar dka' ba'i phyir dang / dbang po rnon po yang nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is difficult to transfer feeling, and because there is no certainty that one of sharp faculty will be reborn in the formless realm.

original: gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: When one is a sequential abider,

original: de la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi'i sa pa'i yid bde ba'i dbang po lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: de la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi'i sa pa'i yid bde ba'i dbang po lhag ma yin no //
translated: the faculty of mental satisfaction is dominant on the ninth liberated path.

original: bar chad med pa'i lam la ni rtag tu btang snyoms kyi dbang po kho nar ste zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam la ni rtag tu btang snyoms kyi dbang po kho nar ste zhes bya ba la /
translated: On the uninterrupted path, the faculty of equanimity is always dominant.

original: gal te bsam gtan la 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: gal te bsam gtan la 'jug pa'am /
translated: If one enters meditative attainment,

original: mi 'jug kyang ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jug kyang ngo //
translated: or if one does not enter meditative attainment.üîΩOne obtains it by both,

original: de ni gnyis kas kyang 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po gnyis kas te /
analyzed: de ni gnyis kas kyang 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po gnyis kas te /
translated: by both the faculty of equanimity and the faculty of mental satisfaction.

original: go rims bzhin du de dag bar chad med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir bral ba'i thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang / rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du de dag bar chad med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir bral ba'i thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang / rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the uninterrupted path and liberated path, respectively, they respectively induce the obtainment of separation and are the basis of that obtainment.

original: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Or, by the supramundane path?

original: gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob cing /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob cing /
translated: If one obtains the fruit of nonreturn by the supramundane path,

original: dbang po rnon po yin pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la bsam gtan la 'jug pa na ni de la sngar smos pa bdun dang / bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi'i sa pa'i yid bde ba'i dbang po brgyad pa dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dgu pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rnon po yin pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la bsam gtan la 'jug pa na ni de la sngar smos pa bdun dang / bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi'i sa pa'i yid bde ba'i dbang po brgyad pa dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dgu pa yin no //
translated: and if one enters meditative attainment in the ninth liberated path, then one possesses eight faculties: the seven previously mentioned, plus the faculty of mental satisfaction of the actual basis of absorption, plus the faculty of complete knowledge.

original: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob //
translated: The last two fruits are obtained by nine.

original: ces bya ba 'di la 'gal ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di la 'gal ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To demonstrate that this contradicts the treatise,üîΩhe says,

original: 'o na chos mngon pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'o na chos mngon pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: but the Abhidharma states...

original: ye shes 'jug pa las so //
analyzed: ye shes 'jug pa las so //
translated: in the context of the knowledge of entry.

original: tshor ba gsum cig car mngon du gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshor ba gsum cig car mngon du gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: The three feelings do not manifest simultaneously.

original: de'i phyir de ni dgu kho nas 'thob bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni dgu kho nas 'thob bo //
translated: Therefore it is obtained by nine.

original: de'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore there is no contradiction.

original: bstan bcos ni dgongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos ni dgongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the treatise is provisional.

original: 'dir dgongs pa gang yin @126a * //
analyzed: 'dir dgongs pa gang yin @126a * //
translated: What is the intended meaning here?

original: zhe na ; de'i phyir /
analyzed: zhe na ; de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid //üîΩces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //üîΩbde bas thob pa la yongs su nyams shing yang yid bde bas 'thob la /
analyzed: bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid // ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so // bde bas thob pa la yongs su nyams shing yang yid bde bas 'thob la /
translated: Arhatship is obtained by eleven.

original: de las yongs su nyams te /
analyzed: de las yongs su nyams te /
translated: Obtained by pleasure means that one who has previously obtained it by the faculty of pleasure regains it when it degenerates.üîΩObtained by mental pleasure means that one who has previously obtained it by the faculty of mental pleasure regains it when it degenerates.

original: slar btang snyoms kyis 'thob kyi /üîΩsa tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir dang / phan tshun rnam pa 'gal ba'i phyir dang / rdzas nyid mtshungs par ldan pa yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: slar btang snyoms kyis 'thob kyi / sa tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir dang / phan tshun rnam pa 'gal ba'i phyir dang / rdzas nyid mtshungs par ldan pa yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Obtained by equanimity means that one who has previously obtained it by the faculty of equanimity regains it when it degenerates.

original: bde ba la sogs pa rnams dus gcig tu srid pa yod pa ni ma yin no //üîΩ'di phyir mi 'ong ba la yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rnams dus gcig tu srid pa yod pa ni ma yin no // 'di phyir mi 'ong ba la yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: But it is not possible for pleasure and so on to exist simultaneously because they are different levels, they mutually exclude each other and they are concomitant with equivalent substance.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang dgra bcom pa nyid ltar bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang ; btang snyoms rnams kyis 'thob ste /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang dgra bcom pa nyid ltar bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang ; btang snyoms rnams kyis 'thob ste /
translated: Also for nonreturners means that the result of nonreturn is obtained by pleasure, mental pleasure and equanimity, just as arhatship is.

original: de'i phyir de yang yongs su nyams nas dbang po bcu gcig dag gis 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /üîΩ'di ni yongs su nyams phan chad //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang yongs su nyams nas dbang po bcu gcig dag gis 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du sems na / 'di ni yongs su nyams phan chad //
translated: Therefore, if one regresses from that state, one obtains it by means of eleven faculties.

original: ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: This is the extensive explanation of the verse that states:

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa gang yin pa da ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa gang yin pa da ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: One who regresses from the result of nonreturner also regresses from freedom from attachment to the desire realm.

original: de'i phyir de la phyis bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa mi srid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir de la phyis bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa mi srid de /
translated: Therefore, it is impossible that one would later obtain it by means of the faculty of pleasure.

original: bde ba'i dbang po ni bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po ni bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the faculty of pleasure belongs to the level of the third absorption.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: 'di ni nyams phan chad nam yang bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa med do zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'di ni nyams phan chad nam yang bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa med do zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: it is said that one who has regressed never obtains it by means of the faculty of pleasure.

original: ci gang las bde ba'i dbang pos thob pa kho na bkag pas yid bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: ci gang las bde ba'i dbang pos thob pa kho na bkag pas yid bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: Does one who obtains it by means of the faculty of pleasure definitely obtain it by means of the faculty of mental satisfaction?

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To explain this, the root text says:

original: gal te rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi la 'jug na ni 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig go //
analyzed: gal te rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi la 'jug na ni 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig go //
translated: If one enters the actual basis of absorption on the ninth liberated path, one would obtain it.

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te //
translated: But that is not possible.

original: 'di ltar yongs su nyams par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rtul po yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su nyams par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rtul po yin la /
translated: Because one who regresses is of dull faculty.

original: gang zhig dbang po rtul po yin pa de ni rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi la 'jug par mi nus so //
analyzed: gang zhig dbang po rtul po yin pa de ni rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi la 'jug par mi nus so //
translated: One who is of dull faculty is not able to enter the actual basis of absorption on the ninth liberated path.

original: dbang po rnon pos nus mod kyi /
analyzed: dbang po rnon pos nus mod kyi /
translated: One of sharp faculty can,

original: de la yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but it is impossible that one of sharp faculty regresses.

original: de lta bu yod mod kyi /üîΩ'on kyang de dbang po rtul po yin kyang mthar gyis par gyur pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob cing /üîΩde las yongs su nyams par gyur pas mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te /
analyzed: de lta bu yod mod kyi / 'on kyang de dbang po rtul po yin kyang mthar gyis par gyur pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob cing / de las yongs su nyams par gyur pas mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te /
translated: Although that is so,üîΩone who is of dull faculty becomes an enterer to the result of nonreturn by being a serial abandoner and obtains the result of nonreturn.

original: dbang po spo bar byed la /
analyzed: dbang po spo bar byed la /
translated: One who regresses from that result relies on unrestricted access concentration and upgrades one‚Äôs intellectual faculty.

original: dbang po 'phos pas dbang po rnon por yang gyur nas mthar gyis pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i @126b 'bras bu thob pa na /üîΩgal te rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi la 'jug na ni de'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de brgyad dag gam /
analyzed: dbang po 'phos pas dbang po rnon por yang gyur nas mthar gyis pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i @126b 'bras bu thob pa na / gal te rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi la 'jug na ni de'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de brgyad dag gam /
translated: and having upgraded their intellectual faculty, they obtain the result of nonreturn by the method of the serial abandoners.üîΩIf they enter the actual basis of absorption on the ninth liberated path, then the result of nonreturn is obtained by eight or nine.

original: dgu dag gis thob par 'gyur ro //üîΩci ste 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba bde ba'i dbang pos thob nas yongs su nyams pa ste /üîΩyang yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms dag gis thob par 'gyur ro snyam na /üîΩde'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba la ni zhes bya ba smos so //üîΩyongs su nyams pa med pa'i rgyu ni /üîΩde'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dgu dag gis thob par 'gyur ro //üîΩci ste 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba bde ba'i dbang pos thob nas yongs su nyams pa ste /üîΩyang yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms dag gis thob par 'gyur ro snyam na /üîΩde'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba la ni zhes bya ba smos so //üîΩyongs su nyams pa med pa'i rgyu ni /üîΩde'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gnyis kyis thob par byas pas 'dod chags dang bral ba ni brten pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gnyis kyis thob par byas pas 'dod chags dang bral ba ni brten pa yin te /
translated: The state of being free from attachment is supported by the mundane and transcendent paths.

original: 'bras las nyams 'gyur dang po las ma yin zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras las nyams 'gyur dang po las ma yin zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not the first, because one can retrogress from the fruit.

original: de'i phyir de las nyams pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de las nyams pa med do //
translated: Therefore, one does not retrogress from the state of being free from attachment.

original: dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ba yin pas /
translated: Since all the characteristics of the faculties are to be examined in the chapter on the faculties,

original: dbang po du zhig dang ldan na zhes bya ba 'di yang dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po du zhig dang ldan na zhes bya ba 'di yang dpyad par bya'o //
translated: it should be examined whether one possesses how many faculties.

original: btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni //
analyzed: btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni //

original: yid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: yid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ste /

original: gdon mi za ba kho nar gsum dang ldan par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gdon mi za ba kho nar gsum dang ldan par 'gyur gyi /

original: 'di dag kho na dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag kho na dang ldan pa ma yin no //

original: 'di dag ni phan tshun med na mi ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag ni phan tshun med na mi ldan pa yin no //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: sa dang sems can gyi rten thams cad la khyab par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they pervade all the levels and all sentient beings.

original: 'di ltar dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni sa thams cad la khyab par byed pa yin yang sems can gyi lus thams cad la khyab par byed pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni sa thams cad la khyab par byed pa yin yang sems can gyi lus thams cad la khyab par byed pa ni ma yin la /
translated: Thus faith and so on pervade all levels, but they do not pervade all sentient beings.

original: dad pa la sogs pa las gzhan pa dag ni gnyis ga las khyab par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa las gzhan pa dag ni gnyis ga las khyab par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Other than faith and so on, there is nothing that pervades both.

original: de'i phyir lhag ma rnams dang ni ma nges te /üîΩbtang snyoms la sogs pa gsum las gzhan ba gang dag yin pa de ni ldan pa yang yod /
analyzed: de'i phyir lhag ma rnams dang ni ma nges te / btang snyoms la sogs pa gsum las gzhan ba gang dag yin pa de ni ldan pa yang yod /

original: mi ldan pa yang yod do //
analyzed: mi ldan pa yang yod do //
translated: The three faculties of equanimity and so on are either possessed or not possessed.

original: de la re zhig mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po dag ni gzugs med par skyes pa dag dang mi ldan te /
analyzed: de la re zhig mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po dag ni gzugs med par skyes pa dag dang mi ldan te /

analyzed: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams der skyes pa'i phyir gzugs mi srid do //

analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po dang ni bsam gtan bzhi ba dang / gzugs med par skyes pa'i so so'i skye bo dang mi ldan no zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: 'phags pa ni skyes kyang sngar bskyed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa dang ldan pa nyid de /
translated: Aryas possess the uncontaminated pleasure of the third absorption generated previously even though they are born in the fourth absorption.

analyzed: de ni zag pa med pa rnams spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir spangs pa med la /

analyzed: mi ldan pa yin pa'i phyir sa 'phos pas gtong ba yang ma yin te /
translated: And because they do not possess pleasure, they do not abandon it through changing level.
